src:
Persela Fokus Berbenah Menatap Laga Tunda Kontra Persija Jakarta
06 Nov 2019, 13:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan fokus berbenah sebelum menghadapi Persija Jakarta pada laga tunda pekan ke-22 Shopee Liga 1 2019 yang disiarkan Indosiar. Ada waktu kurang lebih seminggu yang bisa dimanfaatkan Laskar Joko Tingkir.
Menurut pelatih Persela, Nil Maizar, ada dua hal yang akan menjadi fokus pembenahan timnya, yakni finishing dan pertahanan. Selain itu, dia juga mematangkan taktik dan strategi untuk menghadapi Macan Kemayoran.
"Kita kan ada waktu sekitar seminggu ya, jadi mungkin kita lebih banyak taktikal dengan strategi, terus di dalam itu nanti kita benahi quality finishing sama quality pertahanan," kata Nil Maizar kepada Bola.net, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Karena kan di beberapa pertandingan finishing kita kurang bagus, kita sudah menyerang, tetap gol enggak ke kita, dan di pertahanan kan masih ada kelemahan," imbuhnya.
Persela akan menghadapi Persija Jakarta di Stadion Patriot Chandrabhaga, Bekasi, Jumat (15/11/2019). Laga tersebut sebelumnya tertunda karena tim Ibu Kota tidak mendapat izin dari kepolisian.
Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Persela Focuses Improving Stare at Match Delay Counter Jakarta Persija
Nov 6 2019, 13:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan focus on improving before facing Persija Jakarta in the postponed match 22nd week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 broadcast by Indosiar. There is approximately a week that Laskar Joko Tingkir can use.
According to the Persela coach, Nil Maizar, there are two things that will be the focus of improving his team, namely finishing and defense. In addition, he also matured tactics and strategies to deal with the Tigers Kemayoran.
"We have about a week, so maybe we are more tactile with strategy, then later on we will fix the quality finishing and defense quality," Nil Maizar told Bola.net, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
"Because in some finishing games we are not good, we have attacked, the goal is still not to us, and in defense there are still weaknesses," he added.
Persela will face Persija Jakarta at the Patriot Chandrabhaga Stadium, Bekasi, Friday (11/15/2019). The match was previously delayed because the Capital team did not get permission from the police.
Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
